entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:34 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 01:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
